meanings.sent1: The clayiest pot in the collection was the heaviest.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were covered in the clayiest mud after the pottery class.
meanings.sent3: The clayiest sculpture in the exhibit looked like a misshapen blob.
meanings.sent4: The artist's hands moved with the precision of the clayiest master.
meanings.sent5: The clayiest soil in the garden was perfect for molding into shapes.

meanings.definition: clayiest: most resembling or containing clay
meanings.sent1: The clayiest color in the paint set was a rich brown.
meanings.sent2: The clayiest terrain in the region was ideal for pottery making.
meanings.sent3: The clayiest mask at the party made everyone laugh with its exaggerated features.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, styled in intricate braids, looked like the clayiest sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The clayiest aroma from the bakery reminded him of his childhood home.
